title: I broke down and got a new phone.
body:
Samsung Galaxy S9 

traded in my pixel 2 because I was sick of the fucking adapter bullshit and trying to listen to music and not knowing if these fucking pieces of shit would fail on me during a workout. I had just ordered some off amazon and after twenty minutes of using them they both went out and stopped working. 

now I got a phone with a headphone jack thank god 

https://s2.best-wallpaper.net/wallpaper/1920x1440/1602/Red-hair-anime-girl-use-phone_1920x1440.jpg
